name: Taxi Molaco Mountain 3D
description:
Taxi Molaco Mountain 3D is best than the other normal taxi driver 3d hill station games. Hill climb new taxi car game are fun. You have your taxi cab. Drive your city mountain taxi for pick and drop driver game.

Features
• Amusing Visual and Sound Effects
• Summer and Winter Season Environments
• Splendid Variety of Taxi’s with Realistic Vehicle Physics
• Cool Paints and Custom Wheels
• Amazing Hill Station Environments and 3D Graphics
